channel.title: Milestone 8 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to that course. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. For this milestone you are going to be adding the functionality for taking payments from customers to your Point-Of-Sale project. This will involve working with a compiled code library which you cannot see the code for!
